item.title: A new site for a new domain
item.description: New domain After switching my personal site to drewvanvlack.com from andrewvanvlack.net I decided to change out my single page site to a static site generator. While I love working with the full stack with dynamic frontends, but for such a small site it would be a tad overkill. The needs for the new site: Host with just a statics server. Simple to build.
